blogs.title: My First Blog
blogs.body:
Why do we use it?
It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. the point of using lorem ipsum is that is that it has a more or less normal distribution of letters, as opposed  to using 'Content here...,content here'without it
blogs.author: cjay
